allow:
Bash(powershell -Command "
$content = Get-Content -Path ''js/characters.js'' -Raw
# Get the SPRITES section \(lines 137-650\)
$lines = $content.Split\([Environment]::NewLine\)
$spritesStart = 136  # 0-indexed
$spritesEnd = 649

$spritesText = $lines[$spritesStart..$spritesEnd] -join '' ''

# Extract all uppercase identifiers \(2+ chars\)
$matches = [regex]::Matches\($spritesText, ''\\b\([A-Z][A-Z0-9]{0,9}\)\\b''\)
$allVars = @\(\)
foreach\($match in $matches\) {
    $allVars += $match.Groups[1].Value
}

# Get unique variables
$unique = $allVars | Select-Object -Unique | Sort-Object

# Known defined aliases
$defined = @\(''BT1'',''BT2'',''BT3'',''BT4'',''BOL'',''BLB'',''BL2'',''BL3'',''BEY'',''BEW'',''BMT'',
             ''SK1'',''SK2'',''SK3'',''SKO'',''SKM'',''SKL'',''SKW'',''SKR'',''SKT'',''SKG'',
             ''PY1'',''PY2'',''PY3'',''PYO'',''PYB'',''PYC'',''PYW'',''PYK'',''PYH'',
             ''PP1'',''PP2'',''PP3'',''PBR'',''PB3'',''PB4'',''PPO'',''PCL'',''PPK'',''PPW'',
             ''PK1'',''PK2'',''PK3'',''PK4'',''PK5'',''PK6'',''PK7'',''PK8'',
             ''NH1'',''NH2'',''NH3'',''NH4'',''NH5'',''NH6'',''NHW'',''NHG'',''NHF'',''NHD'',''NHK'',''NHS'',''NHB'',
             ''BR1'',''BR2'',''BR3'',''BB1'',''BB2'',''BP1'',''BP2'',''BRL'',''BRD'',
             ''CW1'',''CW2'',''CY1'',''CY2'',''CF1'',''CF2'',''CP1'',''CP2'',''CP3'',''CR1'',''_''\)

# Find undefined
$undefined = @\(\)
foreach\($var in $unique\) {
    if \($defined -notcontains $var\) {
        $undefined += $var
    }
}

$undefined | Sort-Object
")
